name: @modelcontextprotocol/specification
description: Model Context Protocol specification and protocol schema
author: Model Context Protocol a Series of LF Projects, LLC. (https://modelcontextprotocol.io)

scripts.check: npm run check:schema && npm run check:docs
scripts.check:docs: npm run check:docs:format && npm run check:docs:js-comments && npm run check:docs:links
scripts.check:schema: npm run check:schema:ts && npm run check:schema:json && npm run check:schema:examples && npm run check:schema:md
scripts.check:schema:md: for f in schema/*/schema.mdx; do typedoc --entryPoints "${f%.mdx}.ts" --schemaPageTemplate "$f" | cmp docs/specification/$(basename -- $(dirname -- "$f"))/schema.mdx - || exit 1; done
scripts.generate:schema: npm run generate:schema:json & npm run generate:schema:md & wait
scripts.generate:schema:md: find schema/*/schema.mdx -print0 | xargs -0 -P 0 -I {} sh -c 'f="{}"; typedoc --entryPoints "${f%.mdx}.ts" --schemaPageTemplate "$f" > docs/specification/$(basename -- $(dirname -- "$f"))/schema.mdx'
scripts.prep:changes: npm run check:schema:ts && npm run generate:schema && npm run check:docs && npm run format
